metadata.title: CVE-2024-42261 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/v3d: Validate passed in drm syncobj handles in the timestamp extensionIf userspace provides an unknown or invalid handle anywhere in the handlearray the rest of the driver will not handle that well.Fix it by checking handle was looked up successfully or otherwise fail theextension by jumping into the existing unwind.(cherry picked from commit 8d1276d1b8f738c3afe1457d4dff5cc66fc848a3)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
